pkgmetadata.longdescription: List Comprehension and Tools // Create list comprehensions (and other types of comprehension) similar to those in 'python', 'haskell', and other languages. List comprehension in 'R' converts a regular for() loop into a vectorized lapply() function. Support for looping with multiple variables, parallelization, and across non-standard objects included. Package also contains a variety of functions to help with list comprehension.
